update history set history_url = #{historyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, history_name = #{historyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, history_icon = #{historyIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, history_time = #{historyTime,jdbcType=TIME}, history_user = #{historyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update history set history_time = #{time,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} where history_url = #{history_url} and history_user = #{history_user};
